content: Why is it that rustc_lexer hasn't received an update in 2 years? Is it still being published to crates.io? I need to parse some Rust

I need to parse some Rust

rust-analyzer is using https://crates.io/crates/rustc-ap-rustc_lexer instead of rustc_lexer: https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/blob/3381c2e4a8bcea2db3edd1741a7dd3fcdb15231b/crates/syntax/Cargo.toml#L17
rustc-ap-rustc_lexer seems up to date.

Original idea was indeed to publish rustc_lexer crate with meaningful versions, but just using the well-trodden path of the least resistance and relying on ap-published crates turned out to be easier.
